languages.text: "Серфам и планетарной страже выделено две вспомогательных нижних палубы. Чернь перевозбуждена и напугана увиденной катастрофой, потому, чтобы держать их дурь в узде, мы привлекаем здоровых людей в рабочие смены, а прочим подаем через вентиляцию успокоительный газ".

"The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."
languages.original_text: "Серфам и планетарной страже выделено две вспомогательных нижних палубы. Чернь перевозбуждена и напугана увиденной катастрофой, потому, чтобы держать их дурь в узде, мы привлекаем здоровых людей в рабочие смены, а прочим подаем через вентиляцию успокоительный газ".

traits.locale_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments with the rest."

"The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments with the rest."

"The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

"The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

"The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

languages.text: 「農奴と惑星のワーデンは、補助下層デッキへと割り当てられました。一般市民は災厄に怯え、興奮していますので、その無思慮な状態を制御下に置くために、正常な精神状態の者だけを労務に割当て、残りを収容しているコンパートメントには換気口を通じて鎮静ガスを流しております」
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

traits.locale_text: 「農奴と惑星のワーデンは、補助下層デッキへと割り当てられました。一般市民は災厄に怯え、興奮していますので、その無思慮な状態を制御下に置くために、正常な精神状態の者だけを労務に割当て、残りを収容しているコンパートメントには換気口を通じて鎮静ガスを流しております」

languages.text: “小莱卡德的农奴与守卫被分配到了底层的两片辅助甲板，那群农奴被那场灾难吓坏了。为了防止他们引发事故，我们只派遣头脑清醒的人进行工作，向其他人的住处释放了带有镇定剂成分的气体。”
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

traits.locale_text: “小莱卡德的农奴与守卫被分配到了底层的两片辅助甲板，那群农奴被那场灾难吓坏了。为了防止他们引发事故，我们只派遣头脑清醒的人进行工作，向其他人的住处释放了带有镇定剂成分的气体。”

languages.text: « Les serfs et les gardiens planétaires ont été affectés à deux ponts inférieurs auxiliaires. Les gens du peuple sont remontés et effrayés par la calamité, alors essayez de contrôler leurs humeurs. Nous ne pouvons mettre au travail que les sains d'esprit, nous devrons diffuser du gaz sédatif dans le système de ventilation des compartiments dans lesquels se trouvent les autres. »
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

traits.locale_text: « Les serfs et les gardiens planétaires ont été affectés à deux ponts inférieurs auxiliaires. Les gens du peuple sont remontés et effrayés par la calamité, alors essayez de contrôler leurs humeurs. Nous ne pouvons mettre au travail que les sains d'esprit, nous devrons diffuser du gaz sédatif dans le système de ventilation des compartiments dans lesquels se trouvent les autres. »

languages.text: «Los sirvientes y los defensores del planeta fueron asignados a dos de las cubiertas inferiores auxiliares. Los plebeyos están agitados y asustados por el cataclismo, así que para contener su insensatez solo hemos asignado a los que conservan la cordura a trabajar y bombeamos gas sedante por el sistema de ventilación a los compartimentos que albergan al resto».
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

traits.locale_text: «Los sirvientes y los defensores del planeta fueron asignados a dos de las cubiertas inferiores auxiliares. Los plebeyos están agitados y asustados por el cataclismo, así que para contener su insensatez solo hemos asignado a los que conservan la cordura a trabajar y bombeamos gas sedante por el sistema de ventilación a los compartimentos que albergan al resto».

languages.text: "Die Sklaven und planetaren Wächter wurden zwei der unteren Decks zugeteilt. Die einfachen Leute sind aufgebracht und verängstigt. Um ihre Unvernunft im Zaum zu halten, lassen wir nur die arbeiten, die bei klarem Verstand sind. Den Rest sedieren wir, indem wir durch das Belüftungssystem Betäubungsgas in die Abteilungen leiten."
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sklaven und planetaren Wächter wurden zwei der unteren Decks zugeteilt. Die einfachen Leute sind aufgebracht und verängstigt. Um ihre Unvernunft im Zaum zu halten, lassen wir nur die arbeiten, die bei klarem Verstand sind. Den Rest sedieren wir, indem wir durch das Belüftungssystem Betäubungsgas in die Abteilungen leiten."

languages.text: "Köleler ve gezegen dizdarları, iki yardımcı alt güverteye atandı. Avamlar galeyana geldi ve felaket nedeniyle dehşete düştü. Biz de mantıksız davranışlarının kontrolden çıkmasını önlemek adına yalnızca aklı başındakileri işlerde çalışmaları için atadık ve geri kalanının tutulduğu kompartımanların havalandırma sistemlerine yatıştırıcı gaz pompaladık."
languages.original_text: "The serfs and the planetary wardens were assigned to two auxiliary lower decks. The commoners are riled up and frightened by the calamity, so, to keep their senselessness in check, we only assign those of sound mind to work and pump sedative gas through the ventilation into the compartments holding the rest."
